Blog.post: Yesterday nv blog.. sianz... today morning..took cab go school again.. so lazy..dunoe why.. daddy went to china this morning.. missed him alot.. haiyo.. friday english mid year paper le.. omg... its still very sian.. now daddy go china..may 9 than come back... today art 4 periods.. so the sleepy... but must tahan... perseverence... important... haha... actually today wanted to go stadium watch football....bloody rain came ...than postpone.. wah liew.. than take cab go cwp... ate deer's meat than go arcade play gun gun..haha... than come back le...very tired.... going slp soon le.. gdnite... sweet dreams... haha..to everyone in this whole wide world... I LOVE SINGAPORE... hmm.. =)

today such a boring day... woke up at 6+...stil can late for school... liew..damn pig.. when i woke up.. i saw posters of drawings which i drew... when i woke up... i thought abt art.. hmmm.. was thinking.. so tired..dun do la.. than when i opened my eyes... i read something on the ceiling.. "Choices Brings Consequences" .. damn it.. than i turned to the left... " Strive for 6 A1s" damn... was so irritated... than i turned to my rite... "I'm a Champion, I'm the BEST! " oh my god... i quickly kick my self out of bed... started drawing... it was so tiring..than bathe le go eat macdonalds... got one auntie.. stare like looking at alien liddat... tah ma de... siao char bo... nv see people late be4 ah... stupid.. than took 965 from admiralty to woodlands..than took 901... the uncle face always looked the same.. lol..so polite.. reach school..lucky OM mr lee not around.. lol...the clerk liked me alot.. always help me de... than she gave me a late slip... and ask me report to Discipline master during recess..haha... i nv go..lol... than after school was art... haha.. i was like so proud of myself...finished art.. omg.. lol... first time.. lol...than i started waxing and stuff... tomolo still got 4 periods of art.. lol.. dead meat... hmm.. than reached home abt 6... mummy at home.. she say she gonna cook... than i sayang my stomach... hmm.... going to starve again..haha.. bad rite.. lol.. my dad cooks much nicer than my mum.. but i like to eat with my mum not my dad.. coz mummy help me take alot alot food.. lol..daddy abit abit onli... lol..so mummy rox.. lol... daddy also rox abit la.. lol... siao sia.. haha... maybe second time blog abit anxious.. haha.. i borrowed passion of christ from my friend louis.. lol.. sort of my very good classmate.. lol... very cute and childish... but got mature mind.. lol.. ehh.. keep missing her.. dunoe why... haiz... i'm sorry i'm sorry... guess she wun noe..haiz... sorry... Gdnite..~

This is my first blog. eh... should be very funny for a guy to blog..abit girly hor.. lol.. eh.. just no one to share my troubles now.. coz i lost her again.. ha.. forget it.. she'll be better without me... anyway today i'll start with my maths homework... after being motivated by adam khoo...
liew...now still at uncle house..waste my sunday sia.. so tired.. i think i go slp le.. haha... take care people.. =) ai - ni hahaha... ai wo..hahahahaha.... take care... *cyA*

now at uncle house.. today sent daddy go airport... haha.. he went canada... must take care hor dii ... haiz.. he going there check out schools for me... in the near future i might be migrating.. haiz.. jia lat... miss all my friends... but nvm..i hope i do not go... just knew that m.t paper is just 15 days away.. haiyoh... why so fast... haven start studying yet... hmph.. argh... dunoe wad i am doing.. haiz... later think going east coast.. haha.. go "san san xing" tmd so damn fan.. just now mummy play mahjong..than her stomach pain..than i play for her.. lol...win sia... omg.... talented.. haha... my ambition..mahjong DASHI... haha.... kam xia kam xia..haha.. ehh... i want learn to swim.. haiz... very useless if see people drowning..than canot save..haha.... dunoe wad i am toking.. nothing to type sia.. wait lemme think... erm... erm.. erm............. ai ni~... haha.. the song nice rite.. haha... ehh... the took the computer's room fan for them... tmd..now so hot... pesperating like siao.. haha... nvm.. fat ma...can burn fats.. haiz... 2 more kg i must go taf club le.. so fat..haha... jia lat... haha.. yesterday played basketball at school...really long time no play... miss tungsan.. miss everything.. miss coach.. miss shooting 3 points... haiz.. now my 3 points sux... haiz... useless le... its like losing my right hand in basketball..haha.. nvm..i'll come back next year i swear..haha.. later think i go roller blading.. haiz.. sometimes dunoe why dun feel like continuing living..haha..like no point..haiz... siao rite... nvm..i've to face the problems .. haha... happy birthday chalin..haha... now chatting with her.. hmph... think i reach home than i blog lor.. tomolo got school..tie day.. haiz... think my results can throw..haha... eh... nvm la... ok la..blog tonite.. ai-ni =)

just came back.. erm.. from hong wei house... so tired.. woke up abt 7 plus... actually 6+... smsing.. erm.. went to the woodgrove buy chicken wing... bought 6... haiz... sure fat de... but nvm.,..very nice... yesterday i just heard abt iswaran thing... haiz... best if he can get over it.. haven seen his brother yet... my classmate... damn irritating but he's my friend's bro.. lol..canot beat.. erm.. my friend exchanged with me naval base number 8 jersey with my wgs 11.. lol... so worth it.. erm.. now having bad flu..haiz.. think she should be sms-ing her guys now... haiz.. she like it wad... but.. haiz.. i really very worried abt her studies..haiz... going to go watch vcd le.. scooby doo.. haha...i want scooby snacky.. today i talked to my friends abt after o levels who will still be friends and who will not.. ha.. dun really think so.. friends..onli got abt 2... siying and eugene.. ha.. nvm.. so tired.. ok la.. i go watch vcd le..later going uncle house.. haiz... boring.... =) anyway happy birthday chalin.. =) hope u get good results for ur o levels... noe u've been studying hard..jia you... i want go watch movie... haiz.. no one accompany... if someone asked me go..i sure will go de... ok.. blog maybe later... long time no blog... after exam le so shiok.. ha.. kk.. cyA.. - Ai Ni -

haha.. today very bad day again.. keep studying... but..haiz.. later must still study..i dun care..tomolo maths paper 2...social studies and cme... think going to flung cme.. damn.. haiz.. today almost late for school... so nv put jell... instead i put moose.. lol.." Herbal Essence " *moAn* haha... nv comb..just natural... they say i scare people in school.. coz they tot Chen Guan Xi come study in school..haha... i Lee Bing Shu lor... haha... eh... after school library... asked ms chee... haha..she look old.. but i dunoe how old is she.. looks can be decieving.. haha... eh... still have to study social studies.. haiz.. than later miss lim... maths teacher.. lol..she very good teacher..teach until understand than can go..haha... haiz.. just reach home... bathe le.. going to study le.. ciAoz..~ byebye .. =)

Today very sad day... mummy return me fone le... today almost kanna caught by teacher coz my hair too long... hmph.. where got.. abit abit onli.. haha... nvm.. today nv comb hair and wear specs... people say " wah.. so nerd ah.. change new specs again ah? " wahaha... always the same thing.. so gong.. long time nv wear onli.. new specs ah? haha.. siao.. today lucky no Goal! its go for active learning.. it really dun link the G.O.A.L rather G.F.A.L .. haha.. siao school.. after school friends come my house... as usual... the want go upstairs.. lol.. than ask them go kitchen take lift up.. wahaha... they were like WAH! haha.... stupid people..haha.. than tell them my storeroom got basement..wahaha... tot really mansion..haha.. today drank VODKA... omg... madarin orange.. haa..korkor de.. hehee... use the glass cup drink..very "man" sia.. really.. like adult..haha.. now waiting for fone call..so tired... think going slp le..now 10.32 pm.. lol... msn also lazy on.. haha.. just now played basketball at 369.. long time no play still as good... but stamina abit low onli... haha.. after that rode bicycle to 515 the coffeeshop... than cycle past fragrant wood... than go home le..almost kanna knock by taxi... lol... thinking forget to press break... dunoe thinking wad... haiz.. i think i go turn in le.. so tired... really tired.. MUST STUDY..come on jeremy...haha... say le like really can study.. nvm... hope for a better tomolo.. lol...last nite dreamt something nc-16.. tmd... dunoe where it came out de.. it was like people with no skin.. like muscles left onli... chasing me down the slide... eh...those type of slide at the jurong swimming complex...haha... sia la.. den dreamt of my neighbour... his hair so spikey.. than the shirt got... "Come Dig It" i dunoe wad it mean but it was there... i was woken up by the sudden... AI NI!!!!! haha...cyndi... wahaha... than got s.h.e... hebe damn cute.. but ss like selina.. haha..so like selina lor.. lol... bo pian.. haiz.. miss her alot.. gdnite verybody in this earth.. haha...and somemore just now tok to jimmy... HHAHA..his nick.. Wang Yeow Peow.. waahaha... the nicole highway tat guy who died.. i tot his idol or something..haha..so bad... i hope the best for him..and the best in heaven.. out there for doing such a noble thing... hmph... not going to end soon..dunoe why keep thinking back..lol.. eh.. today in class.. becoz no more english paper le ma.. so english period free ma.. wah liew... the relief teacher so "bong bong" spare tyre.. wah liew.. but nvm.. haha.. got FU... haha.. eh.. he talked to me abt christianity... he so erm.. so enlightened... so the ..eh... dunoe la.. wise la.. haha.. tomolo no p.e ... hmm.. take height and weight... must slim slim... bloody monkey... think i nv pang sai properly... keep so heavy... haiz.. haha.. ok la.. good nite people... good nite... GOOD NITE la... good nite... -.- nitenite..

its been 2 days since i blog le.. lol..lazy la.. lol... wad to do.. haha.. eh...i just woke up..dunnoe want to go play basketball in school or not.. haha.. eh..yesterday the english paper was... omg.. haha... dun tok abt it le... yesterday after my exam.. i went to pay bills for daddy.. lol... got daddy atm card... lol..when i use atm machine..the format so different.. .lol... different from POSB... make me feel so man..haha... i went to hong leong finance bank in check for daddy also...so many places... pay the controversy fee.. lol..and cark park fee..haha... keep "shua shua shua" the card..haha.. than afternoon siying eugene come play mahjong.. lol... play le mahjong play daidee..than play poker..than blackjack..than in-between..haha...."DU SHEN" haha...than later watch soccer..haha.. 4-3.. wahaha...quite exciting... i support woodlands de ma..than i went in the young lions there sit.. lol...WOODLANDS SCORE i the onli one jump..hwahaha..all look at me..haha.. paiseh.. haha... than second half... actually want go woodlands there sit..haha..but alot smoker.. tmd... than go back lor..lol... until now dunoe still want play bb or not.. choices...hmm...think go la..lol...dun care... but think not going sch.. sch like... er... canot fa hui..haha...nvm la.. i almost 1 mth no play le..hha...ok la..cyA..ehh... still got something to say.. lol...just now talked crap with lai hui..haha.... both like really nothing to do.. lol... we talk alot of no link stuff..haha.. kindof miss everybody... except jimmy... lol..coz every week sure see him once de..lol.. i still keep the ticket i watched with him.. "Into The Mirror".. omg.. gays rite..too bad..haha... he damn farni... watch can slp.. lol... me watch and cover ear..haha... really scary lor..than at nite go home on light slp..hahahaa.... than morning do hair no need look mirror de..hahaha... than bring contact lense go school wear..haha... pai seh le la.. lol..cyA...^_^

harlo.. now update more consistent le sia.. haha.. ehh.. just put up the tag board onli..haha..anyhow put sia.. dunoe wad colour nice.. haha.. ehh.. this morning... daddy cook ham and bacon and egg for me... so full sia... so many.. hhaa.. a few more kg i've to go taf club le..haiz.. this morning played computer... play and play and play... haiz... than afternoon watch the shi zi lu kou... haha.. NoNo rox.. haha.. than later play soccer... actually want go gym one... but nvm la... play soccer also same.. work out.. haha... than later play with those gangsters.. haiz.. so smelly.. than at nite go cycle tekong park... louis say i wear hat look like one gal... bloody hell... look innocent say la... liew like gal.. haha... ehh.. than just reach home.. hungry sia... i want eat pastamania too..haha.. i want go mos burger buy ice tea..haha.. than add alot milk..haha.. er.. think tomolo watching harry potter... kekez.. daddy ask me call him up cook dinner.. haha.. think i let him sleep ba.. he very tired... ehh.. from 4 slp until now.. later must call him le.. haha... canot slp too long..later at nite canot slp..haha.. nowadays just rot at home.. haha.. no one accompany go play pool.. go walk walk.. lol.. onli jimmy go out walk walk with me.. haha.. than accompany me play pool is kaichen... haha.. harry.. xavier.. alot.. haha.. i finding the vcd jue shi hao bang.. dunoe put where... canot find.. .haiz.. dunoe who want accompany me watch movie.. haha... dunoe can anyone just call me and tok... haiz.. so tired... hope got people will tag me.. =) thx.. haiz.. i go watch tv le ba... lol.. just now tekong park saw eugene ang.. lol..wear my number 11 jersey.. lol.. he keep wearing sia... jia lat... exchange with him with the fuchun 15.. think i lose out leh.. tmd... fuchun so low class.. i mean their basketball team no name one.. woodgrove... i remember.. new school got into national top 8.. that i canot forget.. lol... i enjoy playing with school... lsat year.. most memorable.. haiz.. shawn.. ling yang.. lai hui... and JIMMY! haha.. J side.. our muo qi very good.. haha... pick and roLL~ woohoo... ok la.. end blog le.. haha.. update tomolo..think i go swim tomolo... dunoe want to wear wad swim sia... wear pe shorts always got bubbles one.. haha... wear swim suit la.. i lend mummy one.. hAHHA... siao.. i very hungry le.. i think i go eat chips le.. haiz.. er... shawn and jimmy playing tungsan now.. haha.. miss playing with them... than lai hui playing with his friends.. from pioneer jc one.. haha.. forget old friends le.. than ling yang dunoe go where le.. lol.. ok la.. go le go le..blog tomolo..cyA!

halo... long time no blog.. haha... later daddy coming home le.. miss him so much..haha... erm... tat day i watch shrek 2 and the day after tomolo alone.. troy also watch alone... haha... damn lonely... haiz.. than yesterday got severe headache... very pain.. hope not brain tumour.. haiz.. got one time went orchard alone..think going watch troy tat time..got 1 sissy guy..gave me his namecard... so er xin one... ask me join his model agency... 1 hour $20 ..haha... told him not interested le he still insist.. think i go i will kanna rape..haha.. life's been quiet in the holidays... so cock up... everything.. later i'll be going gym..think go camellia house there one... haiz.. life so sad... haha... tat time at far east saw someone very familiar... really very familiar... my first love... haha.. she growing prettier and prettier..she hasn't change much..except her hair... permed..haha...she nv saw me ...haha... nvm... she wun noe me either... haha... i was so short and nerdy during primary school days.. haha... haiyoh... really very funny... we write letters to each other.... and i always take very long to reply de... she very cheerful tat type.. but until now we didn't even tok to each other in the eye..haha..my letters to her are all computer typed one..haha..my handwriting sux.. haha..her's mostly hand written... all cute cute cartoon one.. haha.. just now took out all read... i remembered she wrote 5121314 3344 ... i didn't noe wad was that... so i took up the fone and call..WAHAHAH... one ah bu neh neh keep blabbering dunoe wad.. than i was like.. ehh shi jia zai ma?? shi jia zai ma? hahaa.... than i put down le..than i ask her... she nv tell me... haha... than after some time i knew..haha... than sec 1 and sec 2... i still like her... but after tat gave up becoz my friend told me she got boifriend... but she dun have... ahaa... i didn't noe... maybe not fated ba... haha... maybe she is not as fated to be with me than siewshuen... haiz.. until now siewshuen haven reply me.. haiz... being so cold again to me..haiz.. nvm..canot be too sensitive.. haiz.. ok la... end of blog... tata~ Life's Sadness and Happiness
